titleStmt.title: Hadassa: or The history of Queene Ester with meditations thereupon, diuine and morall. By Fra. Quarles.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by Felix Kingston] for Richard Moore, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleetstreet
